item.title: rm (Linux Command)
item.description: 자주 사용하는 거 모음 특정 파일 제외하고 지우기 단일 $ rm -v !("filename") 다중 $ rm -v !("filename1" | "filename2") 만약 zsh을 쓰고 있다면 $ setopt extendedglob $ rm ^("filename1" | "filename2") Delete Files Using Extended Pattern Matching Operators *(pattern-list) : matches zero or more occurrences of the specified patterns ?(pattern-list) : matches zero or one occurence of the specified patterns +(pattern-list) : matches one or more occurrences of the spcified patterns @(pattern-list) : matches one of the spcified patterns !
